backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence for adding a clickable contact email to the site, linking changes to frontend/src/App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, index.html, and useQueries.ts.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base definitions and OKLCH color variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page title, meta description, and root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React SPA implementing navigation, hero, features, pricing, FAQ, and contact sections with phone/email links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since the backend exposes no callable methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with a warm amber/gray OKLCH palette and typography tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling OKLCH color tokens, extended utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, including versioning, high-level service summary, architectural notes, and a list of existing features for building an AI receptionist service website. Contains structured metadata for planning and tracking feature requirements.
